Package com.briansanchez.blackjack

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Blackjack
    This is the main class implementing a command-line blackjack simulator.
    CardDeck
    Uses an ArrayList to hold a standard deck of 52 PlayingCard.
    Constants  
    Dealer
    The Dealer class is a special type of Player who must draw until (all) Player hands are beaten or the Dealer busts (hand value > 21
    LoggingSingleton
    This class implements a singleton design pattern in which the LoggingSingleton.getLogger() method returns a fully configured instance.
    Player
    Implements a blackjack player, storing the current hand of cards, its value and determines whether the player has busted.
    PlayingCard
    Holds the suit and rank of an individual playing card.
    Shoe
    Uses an ArrayList to hold 6 CardDeck of PlayingCard.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Rank
    Enumeration class to hold the card ranks and value(s).
    Suit
    Enumeration class to hold the card suits
